text:
From Ranbir Singing Channa Mereya To Ranveer's Lehenga, Deepika Padukone & Ranveer Singh’s Wedding Memes Are On Point!
From Ranbir Singing Channa Mereya To Ranveer's Lehenga, Deepika Padukone & Ranveer Singh’s Wedding Memes Are On Point!
November 15, it is! After months of speculations, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh have finally confessed about their love and announced their wedding date while seeking everyone’s blessings.
Even though they haven’t revealed the destination of their wedding, the extravagant event is expected to take place at Lake Como, Italy.
How did fans react after the most-awaited news arrived? Congratulatory messages poured in, people gushed, aww-ed, and expressed their happiness.
But at the same time, Twitter turned into a meme-town, as people found a new topic to make memes on. From Ranbir Kapoor shedding tears while singing Channa Mereya at the wedding to Ranveer Singh wearing a lehenga, jokes have flooded social media.
So, here’s your daily dose of laughter!
#1 Ek chutki sindoor ki kimat jaan gaye Ranveer babu!
KYA AAB RANBIR GAYENGE CHANNA MEREYA... 😂😂😂😂 https://t.co/iY653WmaKZ — Yanki Doma 🌼 (@AludumSoPiroMeh) October 21, 2018
#2 What do you think?
The real question is if ranveer will wear sherwani or lehenga in his wedding... Jk😂 #DeepveerKiShaadi #DeepVeer #RanveerSingh #DeepikaRanveerWedding — potterhead07 (@lazy_unicorn_25) October 21, 2018
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 183 SHARES 1 K SHARES 185 SHARES
#3 "Karni sena wale aa rahe hai nagin dance karne"
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are finally getting married. The Pandit will be Sanjay Leela Bhansali. — Bollywood Gandu (@BollywoodGandu) October 21, 2018
#4 Coz sharing is caring!
Ranveer Singh when Deepika said she will let him wear her clothes forever. pic.twitter.com/K0CGQSPslK — SAGAR (@sagarcasm) October 21, 2018
#5 Will they wear matching outfits?
*ranveer orders a lahnga*
deepika : wow it's so pretty. thank you
Ranveer : pic.twitter.com/5XABjG19EG — Manish🇮🇳 (@Man_isssh) October 21, 2018
#6 If this happens!
*Ranveer and Deepika doing wedding shopping*
Deepika : Mujhe yeh lehenga pasand hai
Ranveer : Mujhe bhi — SwatKat- The dancing human 💃 (@swatic12) October 21, 2018
#7 Waiting to see Ranveer in a Sabyasachi Lehenga, are you too?
Ranveer and Deepika enter a store together for their trousseau shopping.
Deepika goes to the women's wear section
Ranveer goes to the upholstery section. — Atul Khatri (@one_by_two) October 22, 2018
#8 Another one who'll sing Channa Mereya, Baba?
Arjun Kapoor after he came to know that Ranveer Singh is getting married to Deepika Padukone. pic.twitter.com/DP1Pj5GTAj — Bade Chote (@badechote) October 21, 2018
#9 He has Alia, you guys!
Ranveer and deepika is going to married
Everyone to ranbeer: pic.twitter.com/octgYE8DRv — Tanmay Sinha✌ (@Srcasticwriter) October 22, 2018
#10 Waah Waah!
So Deepika and Ranveer getting married on 14th November so that no one remembers it’s Nehru’s birth anniversary.
Waah Modiji Waah!! 👏🏻👏🏻 — Maithun Woke (@Being_Humor) October 21, 2018
#11 HAHA!
Prakash Padukone - Baratiyon ka swagat...
Ranveer Singh - Ching's chutney se hi karenge — SAGAR (@sagarcasm) October 21, 2018
#12 Another wedding there!
Ambanis had their engagement function in Lake Como
Ranveer & Deepika's wedding in Lake Como
Basically Lake Como is the Marine Drive ka Gymkhana grounds of the super rich people — Atul Khatri (@one_by_two) October 22, 2018
#13 Mommy's the best!
me: ranveer deepika announced their wedding dates it’s 14-15 nov
mom: oh no tab toh hum bangkok mein hai
😂😂 ok mom — riddhi (@goodriddhance) October 21, 2018
#14 #MeToo
If Ranveer and Deepika’s wedding isn’t fully Sanjay Leela Bhansali style with mansions, complicated but beautiful dances and a guest appearance by Priyanka Chopra, I’m gonna be upset — sai sailaja seshadri (@Saisailu97) October 21, 2018
#15 Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone, Shaadi Mubarak!
💐💐💐Congratulations💐💐💐
Cheete ki chaal, Baaz ki nazar aur Ranveer-Deepika (#BajiraoMastani ) ke pyar par sandeh nahi karte...... 😊😊😊 — Kapil Bidiyasar (@BidiyasarK) October 22, 2018
